General.Name: KMH Hitech Co. Ltd
General.Description: Kx Hitech Co.,Ltd provides semiconductor process materials. Its semiconductor process materials include IC-trays, carrier tapes, module-trays, and wafer ring carriers. The company also offers solid state drives (SSDs), such as SSD enclosures and turnkey boxes. In addition, it provides exterior cases and packaging materials. The company was formerly known as KMH Hitech Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kx Hitech Co.,Ltd in June 2022. Kx Hitech Co.,Ltd was founded in 1997 and is based in Asan-si, South Korea.
